import { Component, ChangeDetectionStrategy } from '@angular/core'; import { products } from '../products'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product-list', templateUrl: './product-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-list.component.css'], changeDetection: ChangeDetectionStrategy.OnPush, }) export class ProductListComponent { products = [...products]; share() { window.alert('The product has been shared!'); } onNotify() { window.alert('You will be notified when the product goes on sale'); } public rotation: [x: number, y: number, z: number] = [0, 0, 0]; public onBeforeRender(): void { this.rotation = [0, this.rotation[1] + 0.01, 0]; } } /*const scene = new THREE.Scene(); const canvas = document.querySelector('#c');*/
